metadata.title: CVE-2024-40675 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In parseUriInternal of Intent.java, there is a possible infinite loop dueto improper input validation. This could lead to local denial of servicewith no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is notneeded for exploitation.

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
